column1: BBC News NI outlines the latest data on coronavirus and vaccinations across Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland.There have been two more Covid-19-related deaths recorded in Northern Ireland in the past 24 hours
column2: with the total number of deaths coming to 2
column3: 123.Another 98 people have tested positive for coronavirus after tests on 1
column4: 913 people.There are 102 people in hospitals with Covid-19 - 12 of them are in intensive care and nine are being ventilated.The total number of confirmed coronavirus cases in Northern Ireland stands at 117

column8: 923 have received two doses.The total number of vaccines administered in Northern Ireland is 958

column10: the Republic of Ireland recorded seven more Covid-19-related deaths
